# The `SelectLike` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-selectoptimize-cpp-/selectoptimizeimpl/selectlike">SelectLike</a> is an abstraction over <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectinst">SelectInst</a> and other operations that can act like selects. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-selectoptimize-cpp-/selectoptimizeimpl/selectlike">SelectLike</a> is an abstraction over <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectinst">SelectInst</a> and other operations that can act like selects.

For example <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aac36edd0f1ce976f0025c98e88d3830ea3a2d5fe857d8f9541136a124c2edec6c">Or(Zext(icmp), X)</a> can be treated like select(icmp, X|1, X).

Definition at line 130 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/selectoptimize-cpp">SelectOptimize.cpp</a>.

### getFalseValue() {#ad6782369911061765c5975ac4d777f38}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;SelectOptimize.cpp&#125;::SelectOptimizeImpl::SelectLike::getFalseValue (bool HonorInverts=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the false value for the <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-selectoptimize-cpp-/selectoptimizeimpl/selectlike">SelectLike</a> instruction.

For example the getFalseValue of a select or <code>x</code> in <code>or(zext(c), x)</code> (which is <code>select(c, x|1, x)</code>)

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/selectoptimize-cpp/#l00172">172</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/selectoptimize-cpp">SelectOptimize.cpp</a>.

### getOpCostOnBranch() {#aad811cf3b50296c6f065133a96294e28}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Scaled64 anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;SelectOptimize.cpp&#125;::SelectOptimizeImpl::SelectLike::getOpCostOnBranch (bool IsTrue, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-selectoptimize-cpp-/selectoptimizeimpl/costinfo">CostInfo</a> &gt; &amp; InstCostMap, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &#42; TTI)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the NonPredCost cost of the op on <code>isTrue</code> branch, given the costs in <code>InstCostMap</code>.

This may need to be generated for select-like instructions.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/selectoptimize-cpp/#l00189">189</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/selectoptimize-cpp">SelectOptimize.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getTrueValue() {#a4f084cd73f3a03dfea46ce6ede486c8c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;SelectOptimize.cpp&#125;::SelectOptimizeImpl::SelectLike::getTrueValue (bool HonorInverts=<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a>) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return the true value for the <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-selectoptimize-cpp-/selectoptimizeimpl/selectlike">SelectLike</a> instruction.

Note this may not exist for all <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-selectoptimize-cpp-/selectoptimizeimpl/selectlike">SelectLike</a> instructions. For example, for <code>or(zext(c), x)</code> the true value would be <code>or(x,1)</code>. As this value does not exist, nullptr is returned.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/selectoptimize-cpp/#l00156">156</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/selectoptimize-cpp">SelectOptimize.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
